32.parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
32.str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.

32.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
32.str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

32.parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
32.str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.

32.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
32.str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
